name: AutoComplete
description: AutoComplete is an input component that provides real-time suggestions while being typed.

suggestions.label: suggestions
suggestions.title: An array of suggestions to display.

option-label.label: optionLabel
option-label.title: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option.

option-disabled.label: optionDisabled
option-disabled.title: Property name or getter function to use as the disabled flag of an option, defaults to false when not defined.

option-group-label.label: optionGroupLabel
option-group-label.title: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option group.

option-group-children.label: optionGroupChildren
option-group-children.title: Property name or getter function that refers to the children options of option group.

scroll-height.label: scrollHeight
scroll-height.title: Maximum height of the suggestions panel.

dropdown.label: dropdown
dropdown.title: Displays a button next to the input field when enabled.

dropdown-mode.label: dropdownMode
dropdown-mode.title: Specifies the behavior dropdown button. Default 'blank' mode sends an empty string and 'current' mode sends the input value.

multiple.label: multiple
multiple.title: Specifies if multiple values can be selected.

loading.label: loading
loading.title: Whether the autocomplete is in loading state.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: A property to uniquely identify an option.

min-length.label: minLength
min-length.title: Minimum number of characters to initiate a search.

delay.label: delay
delay.title: Delay between keystrokes to wait before sending a query.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title:
A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.
Special keywords are 'body' for document body and 'self' for the element itself.

force-selection.label: forceSelection
force-selection.title: When present, autocomplete clears the manual input if it does not match of the suggestions to force only accepting values from the suggestions.

complete-on-focus.label: completeOnFocus
complete-on-focus.title: Whether to run a query when input receives focus.

input-id.label: inputId
input-id.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

input-style.label: inputStyle
input-style.title: Inline style of the input field.

input-class.label: inputClass
input-class.title: Style class of the input field.

input-props.label: inputProps
input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

panel-style.label: panelStyle
panel-style.title: Inline style of the overlay panel.

panel-class.label: panelClass
panel-class.title: Style class of the overlay panel.

panel-props.label: panelProps
panel-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to the overlay panel inside the component.

dropdown-icon.label: dropdownIcon
dropdown-icon.title: Icon to display in the dropdown.

dropdown-class.label: dropdownClass
dropdown-class.title: Style class of the dropdown button.

loading-icon.label: loadingIcon
loading-icon.title: Icon to display in loading state.

remove-token-icon.label: removeTokenIcon
remove-token-icon.title: Icon to display in chip remove action.

virtual-scroller-options.label: virtualScrollerOptions
virtual-scroller-options.title: Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it.

auto-option-focus.label: autoOptionFocus
auto-option-focus.title: Whether to focus on the first visible or selected element when the overlay panel is shown.

select-on-focus.label: selectOnFocus
select-on-focus.title: When enabled, the focused option is selected.

focus-on-hover.label: focusOnHover
focus-on-hover.title: When enabled, the focus is placed on the hovered option.

search-locale.label: searchLocale
search-locale.title: Locale to use in searching. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

search-message.label: searchMessage
search-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when filtering returns any results. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

selection-message.label: selectionMessage
selection-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when options are selected. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

empty-selection-message.label: emptySelectionMessage
empty-selection-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when any option is not selected. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

empty-search-message.label: emptySearchMessage
empty-search-message.title: Text to display when filtering does not return any results. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the element in tabbing order.

aria-label.label: ariaLabel
aria-label.title: Defines a string value that labels an interactive element.

aria-labelledby.label: ariaLabelledby
aria-labelledby.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: empty
slots.title: Custom empty template when there is no data to display.

slots.name: removetokenicon
slots.title: Custom remove token icon template in multiple mode.
